subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Celtics, who have lost 25 of 32, and the Lakers, who have dropped 23 of 29, have plummeted to unusual depths. For only the second time in 65 seasons, it seems, both teams will miss the playoffs.
snippet: The Celtics, who have lost 25 of 32, and the Lakers, who have dropped 23 of 29, have plummeted to unusual depths. For only the second time in 65 seasons, it seems, both teams will miss the playoffs.
